name: Wizardry Squared
description:
Wizardry Squared is a physics-based spell-crafting action RPG. You are young square wizard, exploring increasingly more difficult procedurally generated levels, enemies, dungeons, and bosses to exact revenge against the ones who have wronged you. Along the way you will enhance your attributes, equip magical items, and acquire and create new spells to find treasures, solve puzzles, and delve deep into dungeons. These efforts will surely help you in the final level.

Key Features

  • Unique Spell-Crafting Interface

  • Upgradable stats, purchasable spells & runes, and fast-travel
  • Procedural Dungeons full of puzzles, enemies, bosses, and new magical gear!

  • New Loots system enhances abilities to push into challenging worlds unknown
  • New Runesystem enhances abilities to push into challenging worlds unknown
  • Brave the new Void Worlds and be rewarded with Void Runes.
  • Casual RPG Shooter

  • Spell-crafting; Make the spells you need
  • Quick-spells: Store the spells you use often
  • Physics-based Problems to Solve for Loot
  • More than 1000 levels...probably a lot more
  • Different enemy types and procedurally built mini-bosses
  • Drop-In/Out Couch-Coop
  • Couch-mate PvP in the Wizardry Dueling Arena

  • Controller(s) or Keyboard/Mouse
  • A helpful pet companion

It may be finished, but, there is always room for more.
Its just me so let me know your ideas and if there is enough interest I will make it happen.
